property.name: ingest.data.types
property.description: The list of datatypes to be processed by the system.

property.name: snowflake.zookeepers
property.description: List of zookeepers for caching snowflake timestamps if enabled

property.name: ingest.fatal.errors
property.description: This is the list of comma delimited RawDataError enumerations that we consider fatal. EVENT_DATE_MISSING: Event date for the event record was not parsed out successfully ERROR_METRIC: This is a record containing metrics information about an error upstream UPSTREAM_ERROR: This is an record that contained an error discovered upstream

property.name: ingest.value.dedup.by.timestamp
property.description:
These parameters determine how and if deduping will be done
dedup by timestamp uses the timestamp the to ms to remove duplicate counts. This is mainly done for the edgetable. If A:B is seen more than once with the exact same time stamp it is deemed a dup.

property.name: ingest.value.dedup.aggregation
property.description:
These parameters determine how and if deduping will be done
dedup.aggregation bypasses the timestamp dedup, because the objets being counted can be uniqued via other methods
